text: Frank Morgan (February 1, 1880 â€“ September 18, 1949) was an American actor. His real name was Francis Phillip Wuppermann. He was born in New York City. He attended Cornell University. His brother, Ralph, was in show business. Morgan began acting in 1902. On movies, he played various characters in the 1939 movie The Wizard of Oz. Morgan was married and had a son. He died of a heart attack on September 18, 1949. He has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. == Other websites == * * * Frank Morgan at Great Character Actors * Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1880 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Frank Morgan
